segment.source: Configuring MED-V Server for Cluster Mode
segment.target: Configuring MED-V Server for Cluster Mode

segment.source: Configuring MED-V Server for Cluster Mode
segment.target: Configuring MED-V Server for Cluster Mode

segment.source: Configuring MED-V Server for Cluster Mode
segment.target: Configuring MED-V Server for Cluster Mode

segment.source: You can configure the MED-V server in cluster mode.
segment.target: You can configure the MED-V server in cluster mode.

segment.source: In cluster mode, two servers are used and all files identified as mutual to both servers are placed on a file system.
segment.target: In cluster mode, two servers are used and all files identified as mutual to both servers are placed on a file system.

segment.source: The server accesses the files from the file system rather than storing the files locally.
segment.target: The server accesses the files from the file system rather than storing the files locally.

segment.source: To configure the MED-V server in cluster mode
segment.target: To configure the MED-V server in cluster mode

segment.source: Install and configure MED-V on one of the servers.
segment.target: Install and configure MED-V on one of the servers.

segment.source: Create a shared network in a central location where all of the servers can access it.
segment.target: Create a shared network in a central location where all of the servers can access it.

segment.source: Copy the contents of the InstallDir/Servers/ConfigurationServer folder to the shared network.
segment.target: Copy the contents of the InstallDir/Servers/ConfigurationServer folder to the shared network.

segment.source: Install MED-V server on all designated servers.
segment.target: Install MED-V server on all designated servers.

segment.source: On the shared network, assign full access to all MED-V server system accounts.
segment.target: On the shared network, assign full access to all MED-V server system accounts.

segment.source: On each server, do the following:
segment.target: On each server, do the following:

segment.source: In the InstallDir/Servers/ServerConfiguration.xml file, set the value of StorePath to the shared network path.
segment.target: In the InstallDir/Servers/ServerConfiguration.xml file, set the value of StorePath to the shared network path.

segment.source: Copy the InstsallDir/Servers/KeyPair.xml file from the original server to all MED-V servers.
segment.target: Copy the InstsallDir/Servers/KeyPair.xml file from the original server to all MED-V servers.

segment.source: Restart the MED-V service.
segment.target: Restart the MED-V service.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: If all servers have the same local settings (such as listening ports, IIS server, management permissions, report database, and so on), the InstallDir/Servers/ServerSettings.xml can be shared by all servers as well.
segment.target: If all servers have the same local settings (such as listening ports, IIS server, management permissions, report database, and so on), the InstallDir/Servers/ServerSettings.xml can be shared by all servers as well.
